data.eml:eml: New genus and species of cockroaches from the tribe Brachycolini (Blattaria Blaberidae: Blaberinae) and redescription of the Hormetica strumosa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vidlička, Ľubomír (2019): New genus and species of cockroaches from the tribe Brachycolini (Blattaria Blaberidae: Blaberinae) and redescription of the Hormetica strumosa. Zootaxa 4651 (1): 155-172, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.1.10
